漢字  
かんじ.  
汉 Han-Zeichen  
Chinesische Kennzeichen  

Kan>Han nationality also in Korean = Kur.Han[0] vs Geor_gian_ 高麗 Goryeo big-joli  
*Guru 溝樓, "walled city"  
*Gauri 가우리, "center"  

[0] In South Korea, Korea as a whole is referred to as Hanguk 한국, [haːnɡuk], lit. "country of the Han"  
三韓 [Samhan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samhan) 삼한 "Three Great" Han Kingoms  

僅僅 = 仅仅 jinjin (only)
